name: scdlbot
description: Telegram Bot for downloading MP3 rips of tracks/sets from SoundCloud, Bandcamp, YouTube with tags and artwork

DL_TIMEOUT.description: Download timeout in seconds, stop downloading if it takes longer than allowed

NO_FLOOD_CHAT_IDS.description: Comma-separated chat IDs with no replying and caption hashtags

BOT_OWNER_CHAT_ID.description: Chat ID of bot owner for alerts and permissions

BIN_PATH.description: Custom directory where scdl and bandcamp-dl binaries are available

STORE_CHAT_ID.description: Chat ID for storing audios for inline mode

WHITELIST_CHATS.description: A space separated list of chat_ids which should be considered whitelisted - the bot will only join those chats **NOTE** that if both whitelist and blacklist will be used, only the blacklist will be taken into consideration.

BLACKLIST_CHATS.description: A space separated list of chat_ids which should be considered blacklisted - the bot will not join those chats. **NOTE** that if both whitelist and blacklist will be used, only the blacklist will be taken into consideration.

COOKIES_FILE.description: HTTP or local path with cookies file for Yandex.Music

MAX_CONVERT_FILE_SIZE.description: Don't try to split and send files over this number of bytes

HOSTNAME.description: Hostname to show in Syslog messages

SYSLOG_DEBUG.description: Set to 1 to enable verbose debug logging

USE_WEBHOOK.description: Use webhook for bot updates: 1, use polling (default): 0

APP_URL.description: Your host URL like https://scdlbot.herokuapp.com/, required for webhook mode

WHITELIST_DOMAINS.description: A space separated list of domains which should be considered whitelisted - the bot will only process these domains. Example of domain: example.com if the domain has a subdomain this needs to be included: subdomain.example.com **NOTE** that if both whitelist and blacklist will be used, only the blacklist will be taken into consideration.

BLACKLIST_DOMAINS.description: A space separated list of domains which should be considered blacklisted - the bot will not process these domains. Example of domain: example.com if the domain has a subdomain this needs to be included: subdomain.example.com **NOTE** that if both whitelist and blacklist will be used, only the blacklist will be taken into consideration.
